description: Their refined Adventure Waterproof Backpack is a life-proof day-pack or overnighter for any trip – from daily commute to full-on expedition. This durable 30L rucksack comes packed with enhanced features for everyday use and awesome adventures.<br><br>Built in highly resilient Armour Tech recycled fabric with trustworthy roll-top closure, it’s completely watertight. Gear stays well protected, with a reinforced base, waterproof and water-resistant external stash pockets, plus detachable padded laptop sleeve.<br><br>Your safety’s improved too, thanks to reflective detailing and a built-in emergency whistle.<br><br>With super-comfy foam shoulder straps and breathable, ergonomically padded back panel, it’s easy to forget you’re wearing it.
name: Waterproof Backpack 30L - Obsidian

specs.value: made of impermeable Armour Tech fabric
in recycled 420D nylon with double-sided TPU coating
against rips, punctures, scuffs, and abrasions
endures harsh conditions and low temperatures
watertight stash pocket, padded laptop sleeve, integral emergency whistle
highly reflective detailing and bike light loop
breathable, ergonomic back padding, and improved foam shoulder straps
ethically designed and manufactured to reduce plastic waste
